entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Day R Premium
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Handful of capsÔºö‚Ç∫99,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99 [‚Ç∫39,99 ~ ‚Ç∫99,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

In-App Purchases

  • Handful of capsÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Pile of capsÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • Sausepan of capsÔºö‚Ç∫449,99
  • Special packÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • Small packÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Great packÔºö‚Ç∫449,99
  • Useful packÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Standart packÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • Case with capsÔºö‚Ç∫899,99
  • Survival kitÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

Survive in post-nuclear USSR: defeat diseases, hunger and enemies! Play Online also! Survive with other players together. Benefits of Premium version: - Unique pet Raven - Starter Kit - Caches of useful items in shelters - Expanded selection of perks - Chat without any limitations - Reduced waiting time between parcels - Access to all kinds and colors of map markers Can you survive in the world destroyed after a nuclear war? With radiation, hunger and diseases around you. You have to cross the whole country and save your family. Who knows if they are alive, or maybe radiation and deadly virus have already reached them? Reveal a secret of the apocalypse and get your memories back during a journey across the huge territory of the USSR in the 80th. It is not easy to survive after apocalypse. You'll face the real hungry games! Monsters, zombie, thirst, uncountable diseases and injuries, blood-thirsty enemies ‚Äì you have to fight it all. Craft all your resources: weapons, clothes, means of transport. - Hardcore survival: Hunger, zombie and radiation won't give you a chance to relax. - Realistic world: The turn of the seasons, huge map of USSR and more than 2500 different towns and cities. Hunt animals, but be careful: even rats can injure you seriously! Explore the wilderness! - A lot of opportunities: Multicraft, obtaining skills, hundreds of crafting schemes, a lot of ammunition. - People and stories: Interesting quests and helpful allies. An open game world. - Improve your skills: Mechanics, medicine, chemistry and many others. - Cooperative mode: The Online mode with a chat room, exchange of items and united fightings. Multiplayer survival game. Explore the abandoned houses and shelters. Find weapon and build transport using various materials. Remember everything you learnt on chemistry and physics! It is the most realistic surviving game! Features: - –°raft system ‚Äì get resources, hunt, find useful objects or weapon and create your own one! - Hardcore simulator of survival - Journey across the wilderness map in the multiplayer mode - Choose the difficulty mode: sandbox, real life or online War never changes. In 1985 USSR went down before an unknown enemy. In a few days the entire country became a radioactive wasteland - violence, hunger and diseases reign here now. When you no longer loose in the fight with the death, the other survivors wait for you in the cooperative - the Online mode let you survive together dealing with difficulties, talking in the chat room and sending gifts to each other. User agreement: http://tltgames.ru/license-agreement-en

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: The Game of Life 2
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • The Ultimate Life CollectionÔºö‚Ç∫1.299,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫899,99 [‚Ç∫899,99 ~ ‚Ç∫1.299,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫79,99

In-App Purchases

  • The Ultimate Life CollectionÔºö‚Ç∫899,99
  • Mothgirl OutfitÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Tunneler ShipÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Foxman BikeÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Action Car AvatarÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Super Pet AvatarÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Magical Girl OutfitÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Skyscraper AvatarÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Foxman OutfitÔºö‚Ç∫39,99
  • Super Hero World BundleÔºö‚Ç∫249,99

Application Description

Live 1000 lives in the official sequel to the classic family board game, The Game of Life! Will you be a Video Blogger or an Astronomer? Play now! Voted "Best Digital Board Game‚Äù in the Pocket Gamer Awards 2021 Played by over 50 Million Families Worldwide Customise your peg, hop in your eco car and race your friends and family through The Game of Life 2! It‚Äôs a contemporary sequel to the classic family favourite board game, The Game of Life. With an added crossroad moment and new ways to win, what will you choose? Earn points for Knowledge and Happiness as well as Wealth. Go to College, or don‚Äôt. Get married early, save it for later, or stay single! Have kids, adopt pets, do both or neither. The choices are all yours, and every decision counts! Features The Game of Life 2 digital board game is the award-winning sequel to the original Hasbro board game, The Game of Life. ‚Ä¢ A GAME FOR UP 4 PLAYERS - Join 3 of your favourite people and live your dreams ‚Ä¢ *NEW* VIDEO CHAT AND PLAY - Live every life face-to-face with in-game video chat ‚Ä¢ AN AD-FREE GAME - Enjoy the complete game with no interruptions ‚Ä¢ 6 TRANSLATIONS - English, French, Spanish, German, Italian and Brazilian Portuguese ‚Ä¢ SINGLE PLAYER - Take on our challenging AI ‚Ä¢ ONLINE MULTIPLAYER - Connect with fans, or invite friends and family to a private game ‚Ä¢ PASS & PLAY - No internet? No problem! Pass a single device between players for a wifi-free experience How to play CUSTOMISE your character Customise your pink, blue or newly available purple peg with a style all of your own. SPIN THE SPINNER The game starts with a big decision. Will you go to College or straight into work? In this classic simulation, what will your friends and family choose? It‚Äôs your LIFE PATH Get married or don‚Äôt, have kids, adopt pets, or both! Work as a Pet Groomer, then qualify and become a Wind Turbine Technician! The choices are yours! More WAYS TO WIN Earn points for every choice you make! Every choice increases your wealth, happiness or knowledge, so every decision is valid. RETIRE your way Continue living the life of your dreams! Relax in a luxury home, or hit the road and fulfil your bucket list! Unlike the classic board game, you can choose to venture on! Earn REWARDS to UNLOCK new items Unlock new pegs, outfits and vehicles by playing the game and earning rewards! In-game Video Chat Recreate the magic! Gather around the board with in-game video chat in Online Multiplayer Mode. It‚Äôs super easy to set-up and play: ‚Ä¢ Create your free private account ‚Ä¢ Invite your friends and family to chat groups ‚Ä¢ Start games straight from those chats ‚Ä¢ Play face-to-face wherever you are It‚Äôs simple, seamless fun for everyone. The Ultimate Life Collection Venture into a collection of 10 amazing fantasy worlds. Live life in enchanted worlds, make friends with dinosaurs in the Age of Giants and launch into the futuristic Lunar Age! Every new world features new Outfits, Vehicles, Jobs, Properties and more!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Hitman Sniper
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Starter PackÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫129,99 [‚Ç∫129,99 ~ ‚Ç∫229,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

In-App Purchases

  • Limited Time OfferÔºö‚Ç∫699,99
  • Extra Large Tokens PackÔºö‚Ç∫499,99
  • Extra Large Money PackÔºö‚Ç∫349,99
  • Promo BundleÔºö‚Ç∫999,99
  • Starter PackÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Medium Money PackÔºö‚Ç∫179,99

Application Description

BECOME THE ULTIMATE SILENT ASSASSIN Step into the shoes of Agent 47 in Hitman: Sniper and discover the most compelling sniper experience on mobile. TACTICAL MISSIONS IN MONTENEGRO Hone your strategic skills and orchestrate the perfect assassination. ACTION ZOMBIE CHALLENGE IN DEATH VALLEY Prepare for non-stop action in a true test of your accuracy and speed of execution. MORE THAN 150 MISSIONS AND 11 DIFFERENT CONTRACTS Improve your strategy for the perfect assassination as you uncover secrets and subterfuges. 17 UNIQUE WEAPONS Eliminate targets, collect weapon parts and complete blueprints to unlock the most powerful rifles. COMPETE AGAINST YOUR FRIENDS TO DOMINATE THE LEADERBOARD Boost your score and climb up the ranks to become the world's finest silent assassin. Hitman: Sniper is memory intensive. Devices such as iPad 2, iPad Mini, iPhone 4S and iPod Touch 5th Generation will suffer from occasional dips in performance and will not support Everyplay.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Cultist Simulator
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫299,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫99,99 [‚Ç∫99,99 ~ ‚Ç∫299,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

In-App Purchases

  • Forbidden BundleÔºö‚Ç∫299,99
  • The DancerÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • The GhoulÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • The PriestÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • The ExileÔºö‚Ç∫229,99

Application Description

SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES. BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck! In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age. Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we‚Äôre bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile. ‚Ä¢ Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history. Cultist Simulator doesn‚Äôt hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you‚Äôll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees. ‚Ä¢ Intense, immersive narrative ‚Äì Combine cards to tell your own story. A hefty novel‚Äôs worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end. ‚Ä¢ A rich Lovecraftian world ‚Äì Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies. Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft‚Äôs tales to an entirely new setting. Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics... ‚Ä¢ The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal ‚Ä¢ The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened ‚Ä¢ The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit ‚Ä¢ The Exile - Some there are who will not yield If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on ‚ÄúContact us‚Äù at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: ÂΩ©‰∫ëÂ§©Ê∞îPro
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • SVIP auto-renew annuallyÔºö‚Ç∫299,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫29,99 [‚Ç∫29,99 ~ ‚Ç∫299,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫699,99

In-App Purchases

  • SVIP auto-renew annuallyÔºö‚Ç∫29,99
  • SVIP auto-renew yearlyÔºö‚Ç∫399,99
  • 90 Days SVIPÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Annual Special SVIPÔºö‚Ç∫599,99
  • 545 Days SVIPÔºö‚Ç∫599,99
  • 3-Year SVIPÔºö‚Ç∫999,99

Application Description

Differences from the free version: - exclusive rain notification - no Ads Expect the Unexpected with this Beautiful and Easy-to-use Weather App Accurate Minute to Minute Rainfall Forecast - When will the rain start and when is it going to stop? Know about the weather in advance and plan your day out properly! Street-level accuracy: No more imprecise forecasts based on a national or city level! Your exclusive weather forecast for every block in the neighborhood is here! Multiple Location Selections: Street-level accurate forecasts to keep an eye on your loved ones! China Rainfall Map - We use the National Meteorological Radar to produce our accurate forecast. Just take a glimpse to know exactly where and how heavy the rain will be! China Air Pollution Map - Is the pollution growing stronger or fading away? Where is it heading to? Just take a look at this map and get the answer to all of your questions! Real-time satellite imagery From the astronaut's point of view, tracing the flowing cloud and glittering days, and Help yourself judge the weather Omni-directional weather map Look at the evolution trend of precipitation, temperature, dew point temperature, humidity and visibility in the next two days. Weather Feedback - If you feel that our forecast is not completely accurate, please tap the feedback button to help us improve! ------ A big thank you to the "Swarma Club" and our partners for their long-term and unfailing support! Automatic renewal service: 1. Service nameÔºösvip auto-renew monthly, svip auto-renew annually. 2. PriceÔºö9 RMB / Month, 90 RMB / Year. 3. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. 4. You can manually open the Apple mobile phone 'Settings' - > enter 'iTunes Store and App Store - > click 'Apple ID', select 'view Apple ID', enter the 'account settings' page, click 'subscription', select 'ColorfulClouds Pro continuous subscription', and cancel subscriptions to end it. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. 5. Term of use: https://caiyunapp.com/h5/agreement/vipprotocal.html?ostype=ios_pro&lang=en_US 6. Privacy policy: https://caiyunapp.com/h5/agreement/privacy.html?ostype=ios_pro&lang=en_US

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

The Secret Elevator Remastered ‚Äî an atmospheric adventure with first-person horror elements. Take on the role of a person trapped inside their dream. This place is filled with a mix of memories and nightmares. To get out, you have to open a small door. Immerse yourself in the game's history, walk through many endings, and discover the key secret.

entry.title: AeroPads - Pads & Soundscapes
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫249,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫129,99 [‚Ç∫129,99 ~ ‚Ç∫249,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

In-App Purchases

  • Orbit PackÔºö‚Ç∫229,99

Application Description

Have you ever struggled to find confidence on stage or inspiration in the studio? AeroPads cues immersive pads and soundscapes that inspire and equip you to perform and write your best. ENHANCE YOUR SOUND. ENGAGE YOUR AUDIENCE. Every musician has experienced an empty mix or an awkward transition. When using AeroPads, you instantly add more dimension and character to your sound. With a more immersive mix and the ability to perform smooth and seamless transitions, you will feel more confident while your audience will be more engaged. FOR EVERY MUSICIAN. Pads and soundscapes are a versatile accompaniment to nearly any style of music. Whether you are a soloist or full band, AeroPads will take your sound to the next level. Rock bands, worship teams, wedding singers, producers, songwriters, and instrumentalists are just a few of the many types of musicians that have loved using AeroPads. DESIGNED FOR THE STAGE. INSPIRED BY SPACE. AeroPads features creative and immersive soundscapes paired with a beautiful and intuitive interface, all inspired by the pinnacle of exploration and inspiration: outer space. CREATIVITY THAT SPARKS CREATIVITY. AeroPads aren't your typical pads. Most pads out there are really boring or insanely obnoxious. However, AeroPads features thoughtfully crafted soundscapes that are meticulously fine-tuned with the perfect amount of harmonic and textural movement. Simply put, AeroPads won't step on the toes of your arrangement or get on the nerves of your sound guy (like most other pads out there). Highlighted Features: - A beautiful space-inspired interface with a simple and intuitive design. - Live View: Every key and three of your favorite patches are instantly accessible (best suited for experimentation, free-flowing sets, and songwriting). - Setlist View: Plan and build a detailed setlist (best suited for structured sets and seamless transitions). - The iconic Atmosphere Soundpack which includes five unique patches named after and inspired by the layers of Earth's atmosphere. - Three patches can be added to Live View to be made instantly accessible, so there's no need to dig through menus to just to change a patch when performing live. - Additional patches and Soundpacks available for purchase. - Key-specific pads in multiple tonalities: major, minor, and neutral. - Concert pitch adjustment. How to Use: 01. Cue a pad that matches the key of your musical arrangement. 02. Play overtop of the accompanying pads and soundcapes. 03. Enjoy the boost of audience engagement, musician confidence, and creative inspiration. Pads and soundscapes are intended as a subtle accompaniment to musical arrangements/performances. They are designed to be cued according to the key of the arrangement. Once cued, you'll hear a droning pad centered around the root note with additional harmonic textures within the selected key. The only time a pad's key should change within a song is in the instance of a key change. For best results, mix AeroPads appropriately within the overall mix. When mixed too loud, AeroPads may compete with melodies and the arrangement. When mixed too quietly, AeroPads may be less effective. When mixed appropriately, they will sound awesome.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Deco: Wallpaper Creator
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99 [‚Ç∫39,99 ~ ‚Ç∫129,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

Deco: Wallpaper Your Way. Stop searching, start creating. Download Deco and design the wallpaper only you can imagine. Tired of boring backgrounds? Unleash your creativity with Deco and design stunning, unique wallpapers for your iPhone Lock Screen and Home Screen! Go way beyond the defaults and make your device truly yours. Create Your Vibe: Photos: Bring your memories to life! Use your own photos as backgrounds ‚Äì Deco can even intelligently separate the subject* so your stickers tuck neatly behind (or in front of) it. Gradients: Blend gorgeous, smooth color transitions with an easy-to-use editor and inspiring presets. Perfect for subtle or vibrant looks. Stripes: Design chic and custom stripe patterns. You control the colors, angle, spacing, and background for endless possibilities. Presets help you get started fast. Color: Sometimes simple is best. Pick the exact solid color that matches your mood or theme. Image Playground: Feeling adventurous? Generate completely unique scenes using the magic of AI directly within Deco*. Add Your Personal Touch: Stickers: Layer on the fun! Add text, your favorite emoji, unique stickers (including Genmoji*). Place them anywhere you like ‚Äì they'll look great even on different screen sizes! Simple, Powerful, Yours: Deco makes advanced customization easy and fun for everyone. It combines powerful features with a beautiful, intuitive interface. Deco won in the Swift Student Challenge 2025. (Subject Separation, Image Playground, and Genmoji require compatible devices and iOS versions supporting these Apple Intelligence features.) (iPadOS support and optional iCloud Sync planned for future updates.) Privacy Policy: https://docs.aethers.world/deco/privacypolicy Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

  • Promo BundleÔºö‚Ç∫999,99
  • Starter PackÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Medium Money PackÔºö‚Ç∫179,99

Application Description

BECOME THE ULTIMATE SILENT ASSASSIN Step into the shoes of Agent 47 in Hitman: Sniper and discover the most compelling sniper experience on mobile. TACTICAL MISSIONS IN MONTENEGRO Hone your strategic skills and orchestrate the perfect assassination. ACTION ZOMBIE CHALLENGE IN DEATH VALLEY Prepare for non-stop action in a true test of your accuracy and speed of execution. MORE THAN 150 MISSIONS AND 11 DIFFERENT CONTRACTS Improve your strategy for the perfect assassination as you uncover secrets and subterfuges. 17 UNIQUE WEAPONS Eliminate targets, collect weapon parts and complete blueprints to unlock the most powerful rifles. COMPETE AGAINST YOUR FRIENDS TO DOMINATE THE LEADERBOARD Boost your score and climb up the ranks to become the world's finest silent assassin. Hitman: Sniper is memory intensive. Devices such as iPad 2, iPad Mini, iPhone 4S and iPod Touch 5th Generation will suffer from occasional dips in performance and will not support Everyplay.

entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫449,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫449,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

  • 200 TicketsÔºö‚Ç∫229,99
  • 50 TicketsÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • Golden PassÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

Application Description

Tank Battle is very popular TV game since 8-bit console present. From 2012, we develop "Super Tank Battle" and provide 500 maps to player. Many people play it day by day. Now we using a new game engine to offer new game "Infinity Tank Battle". Infinity Tank Battle is a brand new tank battle game. It is following various classic essential features, and add some new interesting elements. Core Game Rule: - Defence your base - Destroy all enemy tanks Key Features: - Different type of enemy - Different type of Map style - Special items - Auto Helper tank - Import Super Tank Battle 500 Legend maps Infinity Tank Battle will continue update, our target is over 1000 map. And this game is cross-platform, you can find it on mobile, PC, and Mac.

entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫179,99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ ‚Ç∫179,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

Revitalize your Apple Music library! TuneShift intelligently matches your cherished music from NetEase Cloud Music and QQ Music to Apple Music platform. Say goodbye to tedious manual searching. With just a few simple steps, rediscover your complete music collection on Apple Music. Our smart engine ensures you find the closest matches to your original favorites. Core Advantages: ‚Ä¢ Premium music matching engine for precise track identification ‚Ä¢ Preserve complete collection structure and playback order ‚Ä¢ Real-time progress display ‚Ä¢ Minimalist design with one-click operation Privacy Protection: We prioritize user privacy, strictly adhering to privacy protocols to ensure your account information remains secure. Why Choose TuneShift: Professional music identification technology Superior matching accuracy Swift processing efficiency User-friendly interface Let TuneShift be your professional music management tool for the perfect Apple Music experience!

Application Description

ÁÅµÊÑüÂç°Áâá‚Äî‚ÄîËÆ©ÂàõÊÑèÈöèË°åÔºåÊçïÊçâÊÇ®ÁîüÊ¥ª‰∏≠ÁöÑÊØè‰∏™ÁÅµÊÑüÁû¨Èó¥„ÄÇ ËøôÊ¨æÁÆÄÁ∫¶ÂÆûÁî®ÁöÑÁ¨îËÆ∞Â∫îÁî®Ôºå‰∏ì‰∏∫Â∏ÆÂä©ÊÇ®È´òÊïàËÆ∞ÂΩï„ÄÅÊï¥ÁêÜÂíåÁÆ°ÁêÜÁÅµÊÑüËÄåËÆæËÆ°„ÄÇÊó†ËÆ∫ÊÇ®ÊòØÂú®Â∑•‰ΩúÂ≠¶‰π†‰∏≠ÔºåËøòÊòØÂú®Êó•Â∏∏ÁîüÊ¥ª‰∏≠ÔºåÂ∞èÁÅµÊÑüÈÉΩËÉΩÊàê‰∏∫ÊÇ®ÁöÑÂæóÂäõÂä©Êâã„ÄÇ ‰∏ÄÊ¨°‰∏ãËΩΩÔºåÁªàË∫´ÂÖçË¥πËØïÁî®„ÄÇ ‰∏ªË¶ÅÂäüËÉΩÔºö ÁÅµÊ¥ªÁ¨îËÆ∞ÔºöËΩªÊùæÂàõÂª∫„ÄÅÁºñËæëÂíåÊï¥ÁêÜÁ¨îËÆ∞ÔºåÊîØÊåÅÊ∑ªÂä†Ê†áÁ≠æ„ÄÅÊéíÂ∫èÂíåÂ§öÁßçÊòæÁ§∫ÊñπÂºèÔºàÂçïÂàó„ÄÅÂèåÂàó„ÄÅ‰∏âÂàóÔºâ„ÄÇ ËØ≠Èü≥Á¨îËÆ∞ÔºöÁ¢éÁ¢éÂøµÁöÑÁ¶èÈü≥„ÄÇ Á¨îËÆ∞ÂÖ≥ËÅîÔºöËÆ©ÊúâË∂£ÁöÑÁ¨îËÆ∞Âú®‰∏ÄËµ∑„ÄÇ ÊûÅÁÆÄ‰∏ªÈ¢òÔºöÊèê‰æõÂ§öÁßçÊûÅÁÆÄ‰∏ªÈ¢òÔºåËÆ©ÊÇ®ÁöÑÁ¨îËÆ∞Êõ¥ÁæéËßÇÂ§ßÊñπÔºåÂëàÁé∞Âá∫ÊúÄ‰Ω≥ÈòÖËØªÊïàÊûú„ÄÇ Á¨îËÆ∞ÁΩÆÈ°∂‰∏éÂàÜ‰∫´ÔºöÈöèÊó∂Êü•ÁúãÈáçË¶Å‰ø°ÊÅØÔºåÂ∞ÜÁ¨îËÆ∞ÁΩÆÈ°∂Ôºå‰∏ÄÈîÆÂàÜ‰∫´Ëá≥Á§æ‰∫§Âπ≥Âè∞‰∏éÂ•ΩÂèãÂÖ±‰∫´ÂàõÊÑè„ÄÇ Â≠ó‰ΩìË∞ÉÊï¥ÔºöËá™Áî±Ë∞ÉÊï¥Â≠ó‰ΩìÂ§ßÂ∞èÔºåÈÄÇÂ∫î‰∏çÂêåÈòÖËØªÈúÄÊ±ÇÔºåÊèêÈ´òÈòÖËØªËàíÈÄÇÂ∫¶„ÄÇ ÊîØÊåÅcheck listÔºöÊµÅÁïÖÁöÑÂéüÁîü‰∫§‰∫í‰ΩìÈ™å Ë∑®Âπ≥Âè∞ÊîØÊåÅÔºö Â∞èÁÅµÊÑüÊîØÊåÅÂ§öÂπ≥Âè∞ÔºàÊâãÊú∫„ÄÅÂπ≥ÊùøÁ≠âÔºâÔºåÂêéÁª≠Êèê‰æõÂÆûÊó∂‰∫ëÂêåÊ≠•ÂäüËÉΩÔºåÁ°Æ‰øùÊÇ®ÁöÑÁ¨îËÆ∞Êï∞ÊçÆÂÆâÂÖ®ÔºåÈöèÊó∂ÈöèÂú∞ËÆøÈóÆ„ÄÇ Âø´Êù•‰∏ãËΩΩÁÅµÊÑüÂç°ÁâáÔºåËÆ©ÂàõÊÑèÈöèË°åÔºå‰∏ÄËµ∑Êé¢Á¥¢Êó†ÈôêÂèØËÉΩÔºÅ ÈöêÁßÅÊù°Ê¨æÔºöhttps://www.yuque.com/woshixiongda/vdwyc2/gpyq6twirk1u9w2u
